title: Balancing Learning Analytics Data Utilization and Privacy Protection: Enhancing Managerial Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data literacy and educational administration experience
context.additional_context: For corporate language program administrators, emphasizing competency in designing privacy protection frameworks when utilizing learning analytics tools.

learning_goals: Learners can list at least three privacy protection standards in the process of collecting and utilizing learning analytics data.
Learners can explain differences in personal data sensitivity between educational and commercial data usage by analyzing vignette scenarios.
Learners can design stakeholder requirement-reflection procedures as project deliverables when establishing learning analytics policies within organizations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
